segments.text: What are you reading ? You've had your nose buried in that book since last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This book is so good . I just can't put it down ! It's called ' The Power of One ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't read a book like that for as long as I can remember .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me either . From the very first page , this author just pulled me right in !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I read it when you're finished ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm in the last chapter now and it is just gripping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't tell me anything about it . I want to read it for myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . But be prepared for an all-nighter ! I doubt you will want to put it down either .
segments.speaker: S2
